mapper.select: select count(aid) from kh_admin where aid=#{id} and upass=#{pass}
select rownum, b.* from(select rownum as rm, a.* from(select * from kh_user)a)b where b.rm>=#{startRow} and b.rm <=#{endRow}
select rownum, b.* from(select rownum as rm, a.* from(select * from book)a)b where b.rm>=#{startRow} and b.rm <=#{endRow}
select count(*) from kh_user where #{searchKey} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
select count(*) from book where #{searchKey} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
select b.*, a.* from book b, book_author ba, author a where b.bno=#{bno} and b.bno=ba.bno(+) and ba.auno=a.auno(+)
select rownum, b.* from(select rownum as rm, a.* from(select * from author)a)b where b.rm>=#{startRow} and b.rm <=#{endRow}
select count(*) from author where #{searchKey} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
mapper.update: update author set auname=#{auname}, auintro=#{auintro} where auno=#{auno}
